node.text: I want to welcome you here at Riedel in Kufstein, Tyrol 🙏🏻 This is the birthplace of the modern wineglass 🍷 It is here were we produce all of our handmade WINEGLASSES and Decanters ❤️ enjoy the movie!

node.text:
My favorite Spirit ❤️ RIEDEL INTRODUCES OFFICIAL TEQUILA GLASS, April 2002 – Riedel is introducing the Official Tequila Glass, designed to highlight the finest characteristics of Mexico’s national drink.  The glass, designated the Official Tequila Glass by the Consejo Regulador del Tequila, was designed to enhance Mexico’s finest Reposados, Añejos and Reservas de Casa Tequilas.  The elegant slender glass has a capacity of 6¾ ounces. The glass has a tall stem, meant to lift fine Tequila to the level it deserves. The glass was designed at two tasting workshops led by Georg Riedel and attended by over two dozen Tequila producers, officials and cognoscenti, using twelve 100% Agave Tequila Reposado, aged eight months, including Don Julio’s Tres Magueyes and Casa Noble’s Cofradia.
.
.
#riedel #tequila #casadragones #myglass #spirit #holidays #tips #learnmore #santaclaus #myriedel 
.
.
.
@riedel_official @riedelpartner_mx @casadragones @sgwinespirits

node.text:
How to best take care of your wine glasses from Riedel❓all of the Riedel glasses are dishwasher safe 👍🏻 and we recommend MIELE ❤️ as the best machine. if you want to give them a final polish by hand 🤚 please use the proper microfiber polishing towels from Riedel ONLY! these are XL towels developed to give your glasses the perfect and clean 🧼 shine. The towels are available online or via your local Riedel glass source 😊👌🏻 
.
.
.
.
#riedel #myriedel #miele #dishwasher #glass #clean #howtoclean #tips #microfiber #riedeltowel #maximilianriedel #tüv #performance 
.
.
.
@riedel_official @maxiriedel @miele_com @mieleusa

node.text:
The Riedel “Tasting Sets” ❤️ are the perfect gift for anyone who wants to learn more about wine and it’s perfect messenger, the Riedel wineglass. 👌🏻 The functionality of a Riedel wineglass is best presented in a comparison tasting. Each tasting set includes 4 different grape varietal specific glasses. Each one of the glasses developed in a “sensory workshop” to suit the characteristics of your preferred grape variety 🙏🏻 The knowledge needed to develop such instruments was build up over the last 3 generations of the Riedel family. The RIEDEL TASTING SETS are available online and they are the perfect GIFT for anyone who loves wine. To expand the experience simply add your existing none Riedel wineglasses and be stunned about the perfect delivery from the Riedel glass. These TASTING SETS are available in the following collections: Riedel Veritas, Riedel Performance and Riedel Winewings. Take your wine experience to the next level👍🏻
.
.
.
#riedel #wine #wineglass #winemaker #cabernetsauvignon #chardonnay #fun #lego #experience #beamazed #drinkresponsibly #drinklessbutbetter #maximilianriedel #riedelperformance #veritas #vino #wein

node.text:
“O” WINE GLASSES
The designs of the “O” stemless wine glass series are based on the benchmark shapes of the #Riedel #Vinum series. In 2004, I was able to grab the attention of the wine and tabletop industries with the introduction of my "O" series, an innovative collection of stemless wine glasses. “The “O” glass has delighted many and outraged a few,” “People were quick to embrace a glass that offered all the enjoyment that Riedel is famous for yet was more #casual, easy to use, wash and store and added a playful element to the #wine and #spirits experience.” Today, the "O" collection has grown to include more than thirteen different glass designs including varietally-specific wine glass shapes, a glass for sparkling wine, saké, spirits, #water and even for #martini 👍🏻
 
The success of “O” is easy to understand: casual, #contemporary and chic, perfect for those who crave elegant and uncomplicated designs that work for everyday use 
.
.
#riedel #wineglass #stemless #thebest

node.text:
NEW REVOLUTIONARY DUAL-FUNCTION DECANTER JOINS RIEDEL FAMILY OF DECANTERS
❤️ Like Riedel’s many other coiled decanters including the Eve, Mamba, Boa, and Titano Boa, the Horn decanter “double-decants” wine, a technology developed by Riedel to accelerate the aeration of wine by the creation of a vacuum within the vessel. The Horn’s 📯coiled body brings wines to full flavor profile potential when decanted even more quickly than other Riedel decanters.

node.text:
Cognac is a variety of Brandy named after the region of #Cognac in #France. Ugni Blanc known locally as Saint-Emilion grape, is most widely used 👍🏻 Cognac must be distilled twice in copper pot stills and aged at least two years in French oak barrels 👌🏻 In the search for the ideal glass for cognac many years ago, #Hennessy decided to rely on the competence of Riedel, my families company which is known for the development of wine glasses specific to the types of grape varieties ❤️ This cooperation led to the development of a completely new connoisseur's cognac glass, which demanded a totally new way of thinking from traditional cognac lovers. It departed from the voluminous, rounded and tulip-shaped glass; Hennessy now strongly recommends the use of the slender and functional glass which Riedel offers to the market.
.
.
.
#holidays #ideasfortheholidays #riedel #cognacglass #evolution #vsop #xo #hennessy 
.
.
.
@riedel_official @hennessy @moethennessy @lvmh @moetchandon @cognac_official

node.text:
It’s the Riesling glass from the Riedel PERFORMANCE collection Introducing Riedel PERFORMANCE; the new ultimate loudspeaker for fine wine. With three generations of research, development and experience in creating functional, grape varietal specific glassware, my father Georg and myself challenged ourselves to improve on what had gone before. PERFORMANCE is the first Riedel wine glass series ever to feature bowls with the “optic impact” a technology which we invented. Detailed research by the Riedel family, aimed at improving the organoleptic wine experience, revealed that increasing the inner surface area of the glass had a positive impact on the perception of the bouquet and flavor of the wine. This was achieved through a unique optical effect, which not only adds a pleasing visual aspect to the bowl, but also increases the inner surface area, allowing the wine to open up and to fully show every aroma and subtle nuance. Riesling is a white grape which originated in the Rhine region of Germany. Riesling is an #aromatic #grape variety displaying flowery, perfumed, aromas with high acidity.  #Riesling #whitewine #decanter #sakura #riedelperformance #performance #rieslingglass #riedel #riedeldecanter #holidays #swirl #smell #evolution #mature #makeitnice
 .
DRINK LESS - ENJOY MORE  #drinkresponsibly

node.text:
How to best serve your favorite Champagne: Learn more about the history of the most well know drinking vessel in the World. My favorite, the RIEDEL “champagne wineglass” The name reflects the fact that the glass is very different from a conventional flute style “The name Champagne Wine Glass was chosen carefully and deliberately,” Champagne is a wine and deserves to be treated as such. Whether enjoying a Blanc de Blanc or a Cuvée, the Champagne wine glass allows the wide range of aromas of Champagne to unfold. The larger rim diameter enables the scent of the Champagne to be released, in a way which is not possible with a narrow flute. The glass also includes a ‘sparkling point’ to aid the formation of the Champagne bubbles – effervescence being an important part of the Champagne experience. #Winewings #Riedelwinewings #Riedelsommeliers #vintagechampagne #flute #sparklingflute #coupe #glass #champagne #wine #myriedel #maximilianriedel #riedel #learnaboutit #learnmore #holidays

node.text:
Wine service at its best ❤️ When I was a little boy my father always took me to waterskiing 😊 Since it has become a passion of mine 👍🏻 Now it finally pays off 🍀 Delivering wine anywhere, anytime 🍷 Riedel in action 😉 Having fun at the lake 💦
.
.
On the Wörthersee, waterskiing using the Riedel Champagne Wineglass to serve wine 🍷 This video is for fun 🤩 only! Don’t repeat 😁
.
.
#myriedel #riedel #waterskiing #champagne #wine #wein #wörthersee #schlossseefels #wineservice #bestvideo #lolsurprise #riedelglass #inthemoment #thenextstep

node.text:
This 1970 Chateau Haut-Brion from Pessac-Leognan in France 🇫🇷 belongs undoubtedly to one of the greatest red wines from Bordeaux and beyond ❤️At 51 years of age the wine still shows aromas of cigar-box, lots of fruit, earth, smoky spice, olives, leather and sweet cassis. This Haut Brion from the excellent 1970 vintage has received excellent reviews from wine critics in the past and at this stage in the proper Riedel glass it still lives up to it. I tasted the wine in 2 different Riedel glasses: Cabernet Winewings and Sommeliers Grand Cru and it both glasses the wine shined 👍🏻 I even had my father Georg Riedel blind taste it and we couldn’t believe in why great stage the wine was in. 
.
.
Using the Durand to pull the cork 👍🏻
.
.
#riedel #riedelglass #myriedel #chateau #chateauhautbrion #bordeaux #redwine #wine #winelover #winetime #thedurand #wilderkaiser #ellmau #familytime #wow #luxurystyle #1970 #amazing 
.
.
@chateauhautbrion_

node.text:
1993 Chateau Latour a Pomerol from
Pomerol, France 🇫🇷 Merlot 90% and Cabernet Franc 10% 😊 2 of my favorites. Very surprised about the great condition of this wine 👍🏻 1993 not the best vintage but improved over the years. After having it decanted and letting it sit in the decanter the wine started to shine 😃 Beautiful fruit, elegant Merlot 👌🏻 soft tannins and long finish 🤩 
.
.
Served in the Riedel Superleggero Cabernet glass and presented in the Riedel Marne decanter ❤️ 
.
.
@latourapomerol #riedel #merlot #decanter #redwine #pomerol #chateaulatourapomerol #wine #french #fruit #winelover #winetime #kickasswawine #1993 #surprise #quality #fieberbrunn #superleague

node.text:
How to best serve a “big bottle” of wine 🍷 At Riedel we have decanters for most bottle sizes 👍🏻 Today I am using the double magnum = 3L Riedel Amadeo decanter for this vintage 1982  Château Phélan Ségur from Bordeaux ❤️ Making wine service easy ☺️👍🏻
.
.
#riedel #amadeo #decanter #wine #wineservice #bigbottle #bigformat #chateauphelansegur #bordeaux #redwinelover #howtodoit #waitforit #atitsbest #maximilianriedel #luxury #explore #thebest #magnum #single

node.text:
I am fascinated and attracted by beautiful objects ❤️ My question is always: how are things being made? who are the people behind a specific product? We are currently experiencing great interest in handmade Riedel product. people like yourself are keen on knowledge 🧐 and want to know everything that is behind a specific product and what makes a product so special and unique? It’s the art of making glass and this is the art that we celebrate in Kufstein, Tyrol thanks to our most skilled glassmakers 👏🏻 I am introducing to you a classic decanter design from Riedel: The Duck 🦆
.
.
#art #skill #glassmaker #handmade #dreamteam #kufstein #tyrol #riedel #unique #howitsmade #production #design #decanter #wine #cabernetsauvignon #riedelduck #riedelhighperformance #perfectwineglass #luxurylifestyle #knowledgeispower 
@riedel_official

node.text:
on days such as these newness gets created ⭐️ something someone somewhere you get inspired and it burns in you like a fire 🔥 on a day such as this one you let it all out. it’s a team effort to realize your dream. Glass is an incredible material which only few can master. Newness is coming your way 👍🏻
.
.
@riedel_official at work on the glass makers stage in Kufstein, Austria 🇦🇹 Here all of our beautiful decanters and colorful WINEGLASSES are being created by hand. 
.
.
#inovation #creative #creation #crystal #glass #newdesign #skill #art #pleasure #riedel #wineglass #wine #wein #maximilianriedel #kufstein #tyrol #austria #unique #special #design #handmade

node.text:
Special delivery ☺️ A glass of rosé de Provence 🇫🇷 Enjoying a day on the ocean with my family! Wishing all of my friends in the 🇺🇸 a Happy 4th of July ⭐️ 
.
.
No summer is complete without a little bit of pink wine from Provence 💝
.
.
#riedel #rosé #provence #france #montecarlo #specialdelivery #seabob #havingfun #summervibes #4thofjuly #wine #winelover #winetime #fun #drinkresponsibly #yachtlife #yacht #oceanlife #roséwine

node.text:
Enjoying the good Times ❤️ having a boat trip with my family visiting the beautiful south of France 🇫🇷 and of course I’m enjoying a lot of Rose de Provence 👌🏻
.
.
using the Amadeo special edition decanter and the Sommeliers Cabernet glass 
.
.
#riedel #rosé #wine #carbon #montecarlo #monaco #southoffrance #boat #boattrip #yacht #excursion #luxurylifestyle #yachtlife #decanter #savoirvivre

node.text:
Greetings from Barbaresco, Piedmont 🇮🇹 Barbaresco is an Italian wine made with the Nebbiolo grape 🍇 which presents itself best in the Riedel Pinot Noir/ Nebbiolo glass ❤️
.
.
Staying @daigresy a wonderful property planted in the middle of the vineyards 👍🏻 serving Nebbiolo from the Riedel smile decanter and in the Riedel Sommeliers glass 
.
.
#riedel #barbaresco #piedmont #nebbiolo #redwine #wine #italy #gaja #wineglass #winelover #winetime #wein #enjoylife #travelphotography #sunset #vineyards

node.text:
It’s my favorite decanter, the AYAM Rainbow 🌈 a limited edition 1/75 signed by Sir Elton John @eltonjohn The cooperation with @ejaf began in 2017 with a specially created decanter and continued with the “AYAM Rainbow”. In In many cultures, the colors of the rainbow 🌈 represent tolerance, acceptance, diversity, hope and aspiration. These values are more important today than ever before. Therefore, Riedel is again using this stylistic element and has added a silvery line. “Sir Elton John established his aids foundation 25 years ago. Since the number 25 is associated with silver jubilees, I wanted to pay tribute to this by adding the color silver to this strictly limited series of decanters. The original design of the Ayam decanter, created by me, was presented in 2016. It is a practical and functional item with an extraordinary design. Ayam is a decanter with double decanting function and is handmade in Tyrol,  Austria 🇦🇹 Sadly all of these wonderful pieces have been sold and mine was the prototype 🙌🏼 
.
.
AYAM limited edition and the Riedel Burgundy Black Series Glass 👌🏻
.
.
#passion #love #eltonjohn #riedel #riedelayam #decanter #pinotnoir #wine #redwine #crystal #handmade #craft #ejaf #tyrol #winelover #wein #vino #limitededition

node.text:
It’s the Riedel ROSÉ de PROVENCE GLASS which is needed for this beautiful + hot summer ⛱ The glass is part of our Extreme collection 👍🏻 and was developed through workshops including most of the Rose wine producers from Provence 🇫🇷since it is their style of Rosé that represents the most popular rosé 🌹wines in the World. Rosé has become one of the most frequently enjoyed and trendy wine styles worldwide 🌍 especially in the US and Europe.
.
In my glass today is “Rose et Or” by Minuty which is a vibrant, expressive rosé that combines zestful aromas with intense freshness allowing the fruit to fully embody the wine. The GRAPES VARIETIES USED ARE Grenache and Tibouren. 
.
Yes, I decant Rosé just like I like to decant any other wine 👍🏻✨
.
.
The Riedel Medoc decanter and Riedel Rose Glass ❤️
.
.
@chateauminuty #riedel #minuty #rosé #rose #rosewine #provence #france #wine #grenache #luxury #roseetor #riedelextreme #kufstein #tirol #wein #winelover #winetime #thebest

node.text:
Sometimes you must work your wines 💪🏼 never give up! I am working my Penfolds, GRANGE vintage 1996. I opened the bottle last night 😃 decanted it 💨 and realized that it needs more time ⏰ just as it states on google 👨🏽‍💻 this wine is ready for consumption by 2040 😳 Grange is the benchmark by which other Australian reds and also other great international wines are often measured by 👌🏻 Grange is rich with layer upon layer of flavor that coats the tongue and generously lingers after swallowing 🥰 aromas of rich, ripe fruits and spice. On Grange 🕸 It states that Grange blossoms with 15 to 20 years of bottle age in this case we are already at 25 years with potential to go longer 👌🏻 I ❤️ Wine 
.
.
Using the Riedel Cornetto decanter in yellow and the Riedel Performance Shiraz glass to enjoy this @penfolds wine 🍷 
.
.
.
